Parameter.Name: Calculate Loads
Parameter.Whatis: If checked compute boundary reaction forces.

Parameter.Name: Calculate Stresses
Parameter.StatusTip: Calculate Stresses as a post processing step.
Parameter.Whatis: If checked the stress tensor will be computed and written to output in addition to Von Mises stress.

Parameter.Name: Eigen Analysis
Parameter.Whatis: Modal or stability analysis may be requested with this keyword.

Parameter.Name: Stability Analysis
Parameter.Whatis: If set to true, then eigen analysis is stability analysis. Otherwise modal analysis is performed.

Parameter.Name: Geometric Stiffness
Parameter.Whatis: If set to true, then geometric stiffness is taken into account in modal analysis.

Parameter.Name: Eigen System Values
Parameter.Whatis: The number of the selected eigen states must be given with this keyword, if modal or stability analysis is in effect.

Parameter.Name: Harmonic Analysis
Parameter.Whatis: Time-harmonic analysis where the solution becomes complex if damping is defined.

Parameter.Name: Frequency
Parameter.Whatis: The frequency related to the harmonic analysis. If the simulation type is scanning this may a scalar function, otherwise it is assumed to be a vector of the desired frequencies.

Parameter.Name: Model Lumping
Parameter.Whatis: If model lumping is desired this flag should be set to True.

Parameter.Name: Model Lumping Filename
Parameter.Whatis: The results from model lumping are saved into an external file the name of which is given by this keyword.

Parameter.Name: Fix Displacements
Parameter.Whatis: This keyword defined if the displacements or forces are set and thereby chooces the model lumping algorithm.

Parameter.Name: Displace mesh
Parameter.Whatis: Displace mesh with the solution (or not).

Parameter.Name: Free text
Parameter.Whatis: Free text is copied into the Solver-block of the SIF as such.
Parameter.StatusTip: Free text is copied into the Solver-block of the SIF as such.

Parameter.Name: Calculate Stresses
Parameter.StatusTip: Calculate Stresses as a post processing step.
Parameter.Whatis: If checked the stress tensor and Von Mises stress will be computed for the domains activating this equation set.

Parameter.Name: Plane Stress
Parameter.Whatis: If checked, compute the solution according to the plane stress situation zz = 0, otherwise plane strain model is assumed. Applies only in 2D.

Parameter.Name: Element Codes
Parameter.Whatis: Define element degrees of freedom (p:n d:n n:n e:n f:n b:n d:n). "p" is the p-element degree, "e" number of edge DOFs, "f" number of face DOFs, "b" number of bubble DOFs, and "d" the Discontinuous Galerkin DOFs (0 = element number of nodes). "p" and "b" may be entered together, "d" on its own, and the rest together.

Parameter.Name: Free text
Parameter.Whatis: Free text is copied into the Equation-block of the SIF as such.
Parameter.StatusTip: Free text is copied into the Equation-block of the SIF as such.

Parameter.Name: Displacement 1
Parameter.Whatis: Initial condition for the displacement in coordinate direction 1.

Parameter.Name: Displacement 2
Parameter.Whatis: Initial condition for the displacement in coordinate direction 1.

Parameter.Name: Displacement 3
Parameter.Whatis: Initial condition for the displacement in coordinate direction 1.

Parameter.Name: Displacement Velocity 1
Parameter.Whatis: Initial condition for the displacement velocity in coordinate direction 1.

Parameter.Name: Displacement Velocity 2
Parameter.Whatis: Initial condition for the displacement velocity in coordinate direction 2.

Parameter.Name: Displacement Velocity 3
Parameter.Whatis: Initial condition for the displacement velocity in coordinate direction 3.

Parameter.Name: Free text
Parameter.Whatis: Free text is copied into the Initial Condition-block of the SIF as such.
Parameter.StatusTip: Free text is copied into the Initial Condition-block of the SIF as such.

Parameter.Name: Force 1
Parameter.Whatis: Volume force in coordinate direction 1.

Parameter.Name: Force 2
Parameter.Whatis: Volume force in coordinate direction 2.

Parameter.Name: Force 3
Parameter.Whatis: Volume force in coordinate direction 3.

Parameter.Name: Stress 6-vector
Parameter.Whatis: Stress engineering 6-vector corresponding to a prestressed state.

Parameter.Name: Strain 6-vector
Parameter.Whatis: Strain engineering 6-vector corresponding to a prestressed state.

Parameter.Name: Displacement 1
Parameter.Whatis: Dirichlet condition for the displacement in coordinate direction 1.

Parameter.Name: Displacement 2
Parameter.Whatis: Dirichlet condition for the displacement in coordinate direction 2.

Parameter.Name: Displacement 3
Parameter.Whatis: Dirichlet condition for the displacement in coordinate direction 3.

Parameter.Name: Displacement 1 Condition
Parameter.Whatis: If the given value is less than zero, don't set the Dirichlet condition. To be generally useful space and/or time varying values may be given.

Parameter.Name: Displacement 2 Condition
Parameter.Whatis: If the given value is less than zero, don't set the Dirichlet condition. To be generally useful space and/or time varying values may be given.

Parameter.Name: Displacement 3 Condition
Parameter.Whatis: If the given value is less than zero, don't set the Dirichlet condition. To be generally useful space and/or time varying values may be given.

Parameter.Name: Free text
Parameter.Whatis: Free text is copied into the Body Force-block of the SIF as such.
Parameter.StatusTip: Free text is copied into the Body Force-block of the SIF as such.

Parameter.Name: Youngs modulus
Parameter.Whatis: The elastic modulus must be given with this keyword. The modulus may be given as a scalar for the isotropic case or as 6 � 6 (3D) or 4 � 4 (2D and axisymmetric) matrix for the anisotropic case. Although the matrices are symmetric, all entries must be given.

Parameter.Name: Poisson ratio
Parameter.Whatis: For isotropic materials Poisson ratio must be given with this keyword.

Parameter.Name: Damping coefficient
Parameter.Whatis: Damping proportional to deformation velocity.

Parameter.Name: Rayleigh Damping
Parameter.Whatis: Damping proportional to linear combination of stiffness and mass.

Parameter.Name: Stress 6-vector
Parameter.Whatis: Stress engineering 6-vector corresponding to a prestressed state. This is added to the load case in buckling and/or geometric stiffness analysis.

Parameter.Name: Strain 6-vector
Parameter.Whatis: Strain engineering 6-vector corresponding to a prestressed state. This is converted to the corresponding stress and added to the load case in buckling and/or geometric stiffness analysis.

Parameter.Name: Rotate Elasticity Tensor
Parameter.Whatis: For anisotropic materials the principal directions of anisotropy do not always correspond to the coordinate axes. Setting this keyord to True enables the user to input Youngs Modulus matrix with respect to the principal directions of anisotropy. Otherwise Youngs Modulus should be given with respect to the coordinate axis directions.

Parameter.Name: Free text
Parameter.Whatis: Free text is copied into the Material-block of the SIF as such.
Parameter.StatusTip: Free text is copied into the Material-block of the SIF as such.

Parameter.Name: Use normal-tangential coordinate system
Parameter.Whatis: The Dirichlet conditions for the vector variables may be given in normal-tangential coordinate system instead of the coordinate axis directed system. The first component will in this case be the normal component and the components 2, 3 two orthogonal tangent directions.

Parameter.Name: Change of variables
Parameter.Whatis: If checked, do change of variables from x,y,z -> n,t1,t2. This change of variables is only needed if Dirichlet conditions are present.

Parameter.Name: Displacement 1
Parameter.Whatis: Dirichlet condition for the displacement in coordinate direction 1.

Parameter.Name: Displacement 2
Parameter.Whatis: Dirichlet condition for the displacement in coordinate direction 2.

Parameter.Name: Displacement 3
Parameter.Whatis: Dirichlet condition for the displacement in coordinate direction 3.

Parameter.Name: Displacement 1 Condition
Parameter.Whatis: If the given value is less than zero, don't set the Dirichlet condition. To be generally useful space and/or time varying values may be given.

Parameter.Name: Displacement 2 Condition
Parameter.Whatis: If the given value is less than zero, don't set the Dirichlet condition. To be generally useful space and/or time varying values may be given.

Parameter.Name: Displacement 3 Condition
Parameter.Whatis: If the given value is less than zero, don't set the Dirichlet condition. To be generally useful space and/or time varying values may be given.

Parameter.Name: Normal Force
Parameter.Whatis: A force normal to the boundary is given with this keyword.

Parameter.Name: Force 1
Parameter.Whatis: A force in coordinate direction 1 is given with this keyword.

Parameter.Name: Force 2
Parameter.Whatis: A force in coordinate direction 2 is given with this keyword.

Parameter.Name: Force 3
Parameter.Whatis: A force in coordinate direction 3 is given with this keyword.

Parameter.Name: Stress 6-vector
Parameter.Whatis: Stress engineering 6-vector as input is multiplied by outward unit normal to gain the traction on the boundary.

Parameter.Name: Model Lumping Boundary
Parameter.Whatis: When using the model lumping utility the user must define which boundary is to be loaded in order to determined the lumped model.

Parameter.Name: Free text
Parameter.Whatis: Free text is copied into the Boundary Condition-block of the SIF as such.
Parameter.StatusTip: Free text is copied into the Boundary Condition-block of the SIF as such.
